org.springframework.bootstrap.context.properties
Class ConfigurationPropertiesBindingConfiguration

java.lang.Object
  org.springframework.bootstrap.context.properties.ConfigurationPropertiesBindingConfiguration

@Configuration
public class ConfigurationPropertiesBindingConfiguration
extends Object

Configuration for binding externalized application properties to ConfigurationProperties beans.

Dave Syer

propertySourcesBinder

@Bean
public ConfigurationPropertiesBindingPostProcessor propertySourcesBinder()
Lifecycle hook that binds application properties to any bean whose type is decorated with ConfigurationProperties annotation.
